channel.title: Still cant change server name -___-
channel.description: So I used Project Dungeonfest as a source to make a server.. I want to change the server name. like on the cmd part and where it says welcome to (server name) people say to do it on NPChandler.java on client.java ... but i still can't find it and i dont have NPChandler.............................. PLEASE HELP ME * IM NEW*

item.title: Still cant change server name -___-
item.dc:creator: @b3aster b3aster
item.description:
@b3aster wrote:

Well to change the client name I think its clientsetting then press edit find type server name it should look like:
public static final String serverName = “Project Dungeonfest”; change the Project Dungeonfest to the name ( :
hope thats it.

Read full topic
